item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description:
It’s a long time question for me, what default.

This theme is published under MIT License, I hope you may like it =)

item.title: Styles for slim
item.description:
slim is a simple and beautiful jekyll theme, it has only the essential functions so that you can concentrate on the content of your blog.

Now, let’s have a glance at the basic styles: link, strong, italic, deletion, insertion.
